attributes.action: sanction free residential health care for the elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a national scandal that our senior citizens that have given so much to this country, and paid their taxes, when in their hour of need, are asked to sell their homes to pay for residential care when they can no longer look after themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
